description: Dummy video of human pretending to perform hand layup process. Robot is NOT active. Used for initial framework testing.
notes: This is a dummy/pretend video. The human simulates the layup process without actual resin or curing. No robot is present. Timestamps are approximate estimates for framework testing.

events.description: Recording started, all objects visible on table
Human places the mixing cup on the weigh scale
Human pours resin from the bottle into the cup
Human pours hardener from the bottle into the cup
Human checks the weight of the mixture on the scale
Human stirs the resin and hardener together
Human places the first fiberglass sheet on the mold
events.robot_action_reason: Scale no longer needed after mixing

events.description: Human applies resin to the first layer with a brush
Human places the second fiberglass sheet
Human applies resin to the second layer
Human places the third fiberglass sheet
Human applies resin to the third layer
Human places the fourth fiberglass sheet
Human applies resin to the fourth layer
events.robot_action_reason: Resin application complete, tools no longer needed

events.description: Human uses roller to consolidate all layers
